title: Meka Suri
plot: The story revolves around _Meka Suri_ (qv), a butcher, who gets married to his love, Rani. However, when Rani gets brutally murdered by a group of people, _Meka Suri_ (qv) decides to avenge her death with the help of Naxalites.

Plot surrounds MekaSuri, who in verge of revenge for his Rani. The plot involves many characters who made mekasuri a calm going person a manhunter eventually making him a most wanted criminal. A gripping revenge drama. What makes Suri to avenge. Who are the characters involved in mekasuri life, what happened to Rani, why police are in search of him.
